author: Unknown
quote: Believe you can and you're halfway there.

author: John Lennon
quote: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.

author: Nicholas Sparks
quote: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love, and be loved in return.

author: Vince Lombardi
quote: The only place success comes before work is in the dictionary.

author: Socrates
quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.

author: Charlie Chaplin
quote: A day without laughter is a day wasted.

author: Albert Schweitzer
quote: In everyone's life, at some time, our inner fire goes out. It is then burst into flame by an encounter with another human being. We should all be thankful for those people who rekindle the inner spirit.

author: Les Brown
quote: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss it you will land among the stars.

author: John Muir
quote: In every walk with nature one receives far more than he seeks.

author: Socrates
quote: The unexamined life is not worth living.
